author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR makes `MillePedeFileConverter` a global module, as part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/25090.

#### PR validation:

Running the following cmsDriver command:

```csh
 cmsDriver.py milleStep --data --conditions 106X_dataRun3_Express_v2 --triggerResultsProcess RECO --scenario pp --datatier ALCARECO --eventcontent ALCARECO --era Run2_2018 -s ALCA:PromptCalibProdSiPixelAli --dasquery='file dataset=/StreamExpress/Run2018B-TkAlMinBias-Express-v1/ALCARECO run=317320' -n 50000 --processName=ReAlCa --nThread=4 --nConcurrentLumis=2
```

the following message

```bash
%MSG-s ModulesSynchingOnLumis:  AfterModConstruction 16-Sep-2020 15:52:22 CEST  pre-events
The following modules require synchronizing on LuminosityBlock boundaries:
  AlignmentProducerAsAnalyzer SiPixelAliMilleAlignmentProducer
  MillePedeFileConverter SiPixelAliMillePedeFileConverter
%MSG
```

with this branch becomes:

```
%MSG-s ModulesSynchingOnLumis:  AfterModConstruction 16-Sep-2020 16:15:18 CEST  pre-events
The following modules require synchronizing on LuminosityBlock boundaries:
  AlignmentProducerAsAnalyzer SiPixelAliMilleAlignmentProducer
%MSG
```

## Caveat
Both with the old code and the new code, the concurrent LS are **NOT** working as there is an error in the processing about compression:
```
%MSG-e FileBlob:   MillePedeFileConverter:SiPixelAliMillePedeFileConverter@endLumi  16-Sep-2020 16:42:03 CEST Run: 317320 Lumi: 377
Compression error -2
%MSG

```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport and no backport it needed.
